Linear Algebra.title: Racing: Nitro Boost
Linear Algebra.description: Nitro activated! Write a function activate_nitro(speed) that returns double the input speed (Scalar Multiplication).

Linear Algebra.title: Physics: Gravity Fall
Linear Algebra.description: Write a function apply_gravity(y_pos, fall_speed) that returns y_pos minus fall_speed (Vector subtraction component).

roles.architect: Logic: Subtract fall speed from Y position.

Linear Algebra.title: Nav: Dot Product
Linear Algebra.description: Calculate the dot product of two 2D vectors [x1, y1] and [x2, y2]. Formula: (x1 * x2) + (y1 * y2).

roles.architect: Logic: Multiply matching components and sum them.

Data Science.title: Data: High Score
Data Science.description: Write a function find_winner(scores) that returns the highest score in the list (Max Aggregation).

roles.translator: Syntax: return max(scores) or loop logic.

Data Science.title: Inventory: Filter Junk
Data Science.description: Write a function sort_valuables(inventory) that returns a new list containing only items greater than 10 (Filtering). Inventory is a list of integers.

roles.architect: Logic: Filter list based on condition.
roles.translator: Syntax: [i for i in inventory if i > 10]

Data Science.title: Social: Username Formatter
Data Science.description: Write a function save_user(username) that returns the username converted to lowercase (Data Cleaning).

Data Science.title: Stats: Average Value
Data Science.description: Calculate the mean (average) of a list of numbers. Sum divided by count.

roles.architect: Logic: Total sum divided by number of items.
roles.debugger: Check: Handle empty list if needed (assume valid input here).

Machine Learning.title: Survival: Hunger Check
Machine Learning.description: Write a function check_status(hunger, health) that returns True if hunger > 80 OR health < 20, otherwise False (Simple Classification Rule).

roles.architect: Logic: Check high hunger or low health.

Machine Learning.title: AI: ReLU Activation
Machine Learning.description: Implement the ReLU activation function. If input x is positive, return x. If negative, return 0.

roles.architect: Logic: Return maximum of x and 0.

Machine Learning.title: Model: Linear Predictor
Machine Learning.description: Predict house price using y = mx + c. Given slope(m), feature(x), and bias(c).

roles.architect: Logic: Multiply feature by slope and add bias.

Machine Learning.title: SVD: Dimension Reduce
Machine Learning.description: Simplified SVD concept: We only want the top 'k' singular values from a list. Return the first k elements.

roles.architect: Logic: Slice the list to keep top k items.

Data Structures & Algorithms.title: Stack: Push Operation
Data Structures & Algorithms.description: Add a new 'plate' to the top of the stack (list). Return the updated stack.

roles.architect: Logic: Add item to the end of the collection (LIFO).

Data Structures & Algorithms.title: Queue: Dequeue
Data Structures & Algorithms.description: Remove the first person waiting in line. Return the person removed.

roles.architect: Logic: Remove item from the front (FIFO).

Data Structures & Algorithms.title: Algo: Binary Search Step
Data Structures & Algorithms.description: Find the middle index given 'low' and 'high' pointers for a binary search step.

roles.architect: Logic: Average of low and high, rounded down.

Data Structures & Algorithms.title: Sort: Leaderboard
Data Structures & Algorithms.description: Write a function rank_players(times) that returns the list sorted in ascending order.

General Coding.title: RPG: Health Potion
General Coding.description: Your hero is hurt! The potion restores exactly 20 health points. Write a function drink_potion(current_hp) that returns the new HP.

General Coding.title: Launch Countdown
General Coding.description: Write a function get_countdown() that returns a list of numbers from 10 down to 1.

General Coding.title: FPS: Reload Mechanic
General Coding.description: The player pressed 'R'. Write a function reload_weapon() that returns 30 (full magazine).

roles.architect: Logic: Reset value to max capacity (30).

General Coding.title: Puzzle: Score Multiplier
General Coding.description: Write a function calc_score(points, bonus) that returns their sum.

General Coding.title: Inventory: The First Slot
General Coding.description: Write a function equip_primary(backpack) that returns the first item in the list.

roles.architect: Logic: Get the element at index 0.

General Coding.title: Chat: Shout Filter
General Coding.description: Write a function filter_chat(message) that returns the message in Title Case (capitalized).

roles.architect: Logic: Capitalize only the first letter.

General Coding.title: Economy: Gold Loot
General Coding.description: Write a function generate_loot() that returns a list containing ['Gold Coin', 'Dagger'].

roles.architect: Logic: Create a list with two specific strings.

General Coding.title: Stats: Level Up Cost
General Coding.description: Write a function calc_xp(current_level) that returns current_level multiplied by 100.

General Coding.title: UI: Welcome Message
General Coding.description: Write a function show_intro(player_name) that returns 'Welcome, ' concatenated with player_name.

roles.architect: Logic: Combine static string with input variable.

General Coding.title: Combat: Shield Break
General Coding.description: Write a function break_shield() that simply returns False.

General Coding.title: Shop: Buy Item
General Coding.description: Write a function buy_item(gold, price) that returns gold minus price.

General Coding.title: Party: Add Member
General Coding.description: Write a function recruit_hero(party) that adds 'Rogue' to the party list and returns the list.

General Coding.title: Settings: Volume Up
General Coding.description: Write a function adjust_volume(volume) that returns volume plus 1.

General Coding.title: Platformer: Double Jump
General Coding.description: Write a function check_jump(jump_count) that returns True if jump_count is less than 2, otherwise False.

General Coding.title: RPG: Critical Hit
General Coding.description: Write a function calculate_crit(roll, damage) that returns damage * 3 if roll > 90, otherwise returns damage.

roles.architect: Logic: If roll > 90, triple damage. Else normal.
roles.translator:
Syntax: if roll > 90:
        return damage * 3
    return damage

General Coding.title: Loot: Rare Drop
General Coding.description: Write a function open_chest(item) that returns 'Fanfare' if item is 'Legendary', otherwise 'Click'.

General Coding.title: Crafting: Make Sword
General Coding.description: Write a function try_craft(iron, wood) that returns True if iron >= 2 AND wood >= 1, otherwise False.

General Coding.title: Inventory: Backpack Limit
General Coding.description: Write a function check_capacity(items, max_slots) that returns True if len(items) >= max_slots, otherwise False.

roles.architect: Logic: Check if list length exceeds limit.

General Coding.title: FPS: Auto-Reload
General Coding.description: Write a function check_ammo(ammo) that returns 'Reload' if ammo is 0, 'Low' if ammo < 5, else 'OK'.

General Coding.title: Race: Lap Counter
General Coding.description: Write a function cross_line(laps) that increments laps by 1. If laps becomes 3, return 'Finish', else return 'Continue'.

General Coding.title: Cards: Deck Builder
General Coding.description: Write a function play_card(hand) that removes 'Ace' from the list if present, returning the modified list.

General Coding.title: Login: Password Reset
General Coding.description: Write a function reset_pass(email, database) that returns 'Sent' if email is in database list, else 'Unknown'.

roles.translator: Syntax: return 'Sent' if email in database else 'Unknown'

General Coding.title: Puzzle: Sequence
General Coding.description: Write a function decode(secret_code) that returns the last 3 characters of the string.

General Coding.title: Shop: Discount
General Coding.description: Write a function apply_coupon(price) that returns price multiplied by 0.9.

General Coding.title: Music: Playlist Loop
General Coding.description: Write a function loop_music() that simply returns 0 (resetting index).

General Coding.title: Settings: Dark Mode
General Coding.description: Write a function toggle_theme(theme) that returns 'Dark' if input is 'Light', else 'Light'.
